sections.description: Private plugin for the VIA platform to provide VIA course materials, 'play-lists, etc.
sections.changelog:
The change log is in chronological order, with the most recent release information at the top

0.2

  1. FIX: Ensure text doesn't encroach on visibility buttons.
  2. FIX: Path to one-click updater
  3. FIX: Didn't always load the correct metadata definition
  4. FIX: Clean up get_instance() code.
  5. FIX: Didn't correctly explode and process array in vmmodel
  6. FIX: Didn't correctly explode and process array in showSetting_array()
  7. ENHANCEMENT: One-click update support for VPM
  8. ENHANCEMENT: Add user privilege test (is_enduser() and is_facilitator())
  9. ENHANCEMENT: Use filters to access class instances for controller & view
  10. ENHANCEMENT: Add support for VIA Portal Manager Role definitions
  11. ENHANCEMENT: Create default roles: Facilitator & Participant
  12. ENHANCEMENT: Configure roles during plugin activation
  13. ENHANCEMENT: Add PHPDoc for add_metdata_row() function
  14. ENHANCEMENT: Add front-end styling (CSS) & JavaScript support to VPM
  15. ENHANCEMENT: And Front-end JavaScript support for VIA Portal Manager
  16. ENHANCEMENT: Add VPM_PLUGIN_DIR constant
  17. ENHANCEMENT: Add PowerPoint & Word icon styling support
  18. ENHANCEMENT: Add PowerPoint & Word icons
  19. ENHANCEMENT: Added icons for VIA meta data (links, docs, etc)
  20. ENHANCEMENT: Display session meta information
  21. ENHANCEMENT: Conditionally allow loading LearnDash template(s) if LD is present
  22. ENHANCEMENT: Load the LearnDash session/topic template (if available in plugin or theme)
  23. ENHANCEMENT: Embed video links for VIA Portal Manager (End user & Facilitator video)
  24. ENHANCEMENT: Basic styles for Via Portal Manager front-end
  25. ENHANCEMENT: LearnDash topic template w/session information & embedded video playback
  26. ENHANCEMENT: Integration with Download Monitor for VPM files
  27. ENHANCEMENT: Integration with Download Monitor for VPM files
  28. ENHANCEMENT: Add framework for sort function
  29. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Process lists of URLs/arrays during save operation
  30. ENHANCEMENT: Add debug output
  31. ENHANCEMENT: Various debug output for troubleshooting
  32. ENHANCEMENT: Correctly save & display back-end edit meta box
  33. Initial commit
